.
Review of Rating Decisions
When the rating decision is completed, it may be reviewed prior to promulgation by individuals including
a designated second signer, including
the Veterans Service Center Manager or Pension Management Center Manager
a supervisor
local quality review team members
,
and/or
the authorization activity.
Individuals who may review promulgated and issued rating decisions include
the Compensation Service staff, to include Quality Assurance
a decision maker in connection with a legacy appeal or request for decision review under
38 CFR 3.2500
,
and/or
Veterans Service Center (VSC) and pension management center (PMC) management and/or quality review personnel.
References
:  For more information on
correction of errors found in rating decisions, see
M21-1, Part V, Subpart iv, 1.E.3
processing rating decisions, see
M21-1, Part VI, Subpart i, 1.A.2
quality reviews, see
M21-4, Chapter 3
,
and
the legacy appellate process, see
M21-5, Chapter 7
.
